Docs.summary: Converts the specified string into a syntax that allows the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] engine to interpret the character literally.
Docs.returns: The converted value of the specified string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Certain characters have special meaning in [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project files. Examples of the characters include semicolons (;) and asterisks (*). In order to use these special characters as literals, they must be specified with the syntax %nn, where nn represents the ASCII hexadecimal value of the character. This method performs that conversion.
